CustomField.formula: 'Customer site deployment assumes the'+ BR() + 'following configuration:'+ BR() + 'HP server type with 2 procs, 6 cores each'+ BR() + '(or 12 vCPU in a VM configuration).' + BR() + 'If alternate server specs, contact PLM'+ BR() + '(dx-impact-plm@groups.nokia.com) for dimensioning.'
CustomField.label: Note
